oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from a WPLN Nashville Forum with Stokely Carmichael, April 1967
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from a WPLN Nashville Forum with guest Stokely Carmichael held in April of 1967. Panel included Mr. Carmichael and members of the Nashville community. Topics discussed were African Americans exercising their right to vote, organizing coalitions, the formation of a third political party, Self-Identity, Education, the Vietnam War, and the draft. The complete record is available at the Metro Government Archives.
